system.description: Halflings are a cheerful and practical folk, known for their resourcefulness and uncanny luck. Though small in stature, they possess remarkable courage and a knack for getting out of trouble.
traits: Lucky: When you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.
Brave: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.
Halfling Nimbleness: You can move through the space of any creature that is larger than you.
